about:
Some context: This application was created as my final project submission for my CS 326 Web Programming class. I tried to find an already prepared dataset to use for my game database but couldn't find anything I liked or wanted to work with. So I tried to practice my hand at this coding business and make myself a database. That is why this is one janky game database... 
 Thanks to Bootstrap and the wonderful people of the internet contributing.
dynamic1: I tried my best to make this app accessible and responsive... I wish I had more to say about this but I do not so here is some filler text: Next level selfies cronut ethical. Tofu tumblr you probably haven't heard of them, man braid literally forage swag chillwave. Pug yr flannel tumeric. dynamic3: Maybe this time I will have something good to say... nope. My favorite color is emo blue. Pineapples do in fact go on pizza. I wish I was smarter but for now, I will try to finish my dinner. Portal 2 on Nintendo Switch is fun but I think it gives me motion sickness. Still would recommend it. I usually play as P-Body.
